ANS.Chain: ROOT(115元(OP_Sum(5元(OP_Multiplication(1顆|n1 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! ))|10元(OP_Multiplication(1包|n2 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! ))|100元(OP_Multiplication(1盒|n3 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! )))))
ANS.Explanation: Ans: 1顆 n1 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! 就是 1 * 1 = 5元 1包 n2 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! 就是 1 * 2 = 10元 1盒 n3 Warning!! Un-decoded String from IE! 就是 1 * 3 = 100元 Thus, Totally 花 5元 + 10元 + 100元 = 115元
